Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator

Contains the code for evaluating planets and solar systems in terms of habitability, possibility of planets existing etc.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PlanetEvaluator Interface for classes that evaluate planetary conditions
StarEvaluator Interface for classes that evaluate star characteristics
SystemEvaluator Interface for solar system evaluators
 

Class Summary
PlanetDescriber Converts the result of evaluating a planet into a string
SimpleStarEvaluator Simple evaluator for stars
StandardPlanetEvaluator Class that applies some fairly standard classifications to a planet
StandardSystemEvaluator Class that does the standard solar system evaluations
 

Enum Summary
PlanetEvaluator.AtmosphereEnum Enumerated type representing atmosphere
PlanetEvaluator.ClimateEnum Enumerated type representing climate
PlanetEvaluator.CloudEnum Enumerated type representing clouds
PlanetEvaluator.GravityEnum Enumerated type representing gravity
PlanetEvaluator.TemperatureEnum Enumerated type representing temperature
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.evaluator Description

Contains the code for evaluating planets and solar systems in terms of habitability, possibility of planets existing etc.
